reviews.review_msg: Solid professor. Reading material well-related to the lectures. Exams were fair and she was lenient with marking. If you knew at least some things about the architecture that was shown, you could get part-marks. Take good notes on the readings, go to lecture, study, and you will succeed. She's really nice as well.

An amazing professor. She's very happy, very knowledgeable and passionate of her research, and she gives a lot of extra credit. Her final exams and midterms are very easy, and she has a clear grading criteria for all the assignments. I would take her again in a heartbeat.

So happy even on Monday mornings! Sooo much to cover, but she gives u hints about what to remember for exams. Extra credit possible if u go to a night lecture (she tells the class about them before) and write it up. Lots of slides to memorize about what they are and what's important about them.
He is a very good prof.
Very good prof. Very helpful.. Go to class and take notes.
